sentences.en: A grasshopper jumped on Zhus foot. It thought it find a warm place, and feeler there.
sentences.cn: 一只绿蚱蜢跳到小柱的脚背上, 它肯定觉得这地方很暖和, 就停下来,理了理触须.

sentences.en: As a feeler he added, " Probably had more interesting things to look at. "
sentences.cn: 试探着他又加了句, “ 是不是去了更有趣的地方? ”

sentences.en: Be able to use measure instrument, such as caliper, feeler gage, micrometer and so on.
sentences.cn: 熟悉使用常用计量器具, 如卡尺, 塞尺, 千分尺等.

sentences.en: She made a little deal in stocks as a feeler.
sentences.cn: 她在股票上做一笔小交易当作试探.

sentences.en: Take the clearance with a feeler.
The feeler material must be harder than the material that is checked ( hardened pins ).
sentences.cn: 测隙片的材料必须比被检查的材料更坚硬 ( 被硬化的针 ).

sentences.en: The letter was a feeler to see how he would look upon such a movement.
sentences.cn: 这封信是一种试探,看看他如何看待这种运动.

sentences.en: The letter was a feeler to see what his attitude might be.
sentences.cn: 这封信是一种试探,看看他的态度.

sentences.en: They seem interested in a peace settlement and have begun putting out feelers.
sentences.cn: 他们似乎有意达成和平协议，并且已经开始在探风了。

sentences.en: Wemar offers more deepen and much higher quality precision feeler gauge and shim for you.
sentences.cn: Wemar精密 间隙测量规和薄垫片是德国威玛公司为业界朋友提供的更深化、更高品质的高科技产品.

words.tran_cn: 有感觉的；有同情心的；富于感情的
感觉，触觉；感情，情绪；同情
感觉；认为（feel的现在分词）；触摸

trans.tran_cn: （昆虫的）触须，对他人观点或反应的试探
trans.tran_en: one of the two long things on an insect’s head that it uses to feel or touch things. Some sea animals also have feelers.
